title: 1.8纯净端 不停的提示can‘t keep up 求破
author: DarkCat
txt_content:
帮朋友问的  她租的服务器配置  E5-2620  4G内存 
官方服务端  没有任何MOD和插件  玩家人数一直在10人之内
启动参数设置的  java -Xmx3072M -Xms2048M -jar minecraft_server.1.8.exe nogui
服务端参数设置的
#Minecraft server properties
#Sat Sep 20 11:29:04 CST 2014
spawn-protection=16
max-tick-time=60000
generator-settings={"coordinateScale"\:684.412,"heightScale"\:684.412,"lowerLimitScale"\:64.0,"upperLimitScale"\:2.0,"depthNoiseScaleX"\:200.0,"depthNoiseScaleZ"\:200.0,"depthNoiseScaleExponent"\:0.5,"mainNoiseScaleX"\:80.0,"mainNoiseScaleY"\:160.0,"mainNoiseScaleZ"\:80.0,"baseSize"\:8.5,"stretchY"\:12.0,"biomeDepthWeight"\:1.0,"biomeDepthOffset"\:0.0,"biomeScaleWeight"\:1.0,"biomeScaleOffset"\:0.0,"seaLevel"\:6,"useCaves"\:true,"useDungeons"\:true,"dungeonChance"\:8,"useStrongholds"\:true,"useVillages"\:true,"useMineShafts"\:true,"useTemples"\:true,"useRavines"\:true,"useWaterLakes"\:true,"waterLakeChance"\:4,"useLavaLakes"\:true,"lavaLakeChance"\:80,"useLavaOceans"\:false,"fixedBiome"\:-1,"biomeSize"\:4,"riverSize"\:4,"dirtSize"\:33,"dirtCount"\:10,"dirtMinHeight"\:0,"dirtMaxHeight"\:256,"gravelSize"\:33,"gravelCount"\:8,"gravelMinHeight"\:0,"gravelMaxHeight"\:256,"graniteSize"\:33,"graniteCount"\:10,"graniteMinHeight"\:0,"graniteMaxHeight"\:80,"dioriteSize"\:33,"dioriteCount"\:10,"dioriteMinHeight"\:0,"dioriteMaxHeight"\:80,"andesiteSize"\:33,"andesiteCount"\:10,"andesiteMinHeight"\:0,"andesiteMaxHeight"\:80,"coalSize"\:17,"coalCount"\:20,"coalMinHeight"\:0,"coalMaxHeight"\:128,"ironSize"\:15,"ironCount"\:30,"ironMinHeight"\:0,"ironMaxHeight"\:64,"goldSize"\:9,"goldCount"\:2,"goldMinHeight"\:0,"goldMaxHeight"\:32,"redstoneSize"\:8,"redstoneCount"\:8,"redstoneMinHeight"\:0,"redstoneMaxHeight"\:16,"diamondSize"\:10,"diamondCount"\:8,"diamondMinHeight"\:0,"diamondMaxHeight"\:16,"lapisSize"\:7,"lapisCount"\:5,"lapisCenterHeight"\:16,"lapisSpread"\:16}
force-gamemode=false
allow-nether=true
gamemode=0
enable-query=false
player-idle-timeout=0
difficulty=3
spawn-monsters=true
op-permission-level=4
resource-pack-hash=
announce-player-achievements=true
pvp=true
snooper-enabled=true
level-type=Customize
hardcore=false
enable-command-block=false
max-players=20
network-compression-threshold=256
max-world-size=800
server-port=25565
server-ip=
spawn-npcs=true
allow-flight=false
level-name=world
view-distance=10
resource-pack=
spawn-animals=true
white-list=false
generate-structures=true
online-mode=false
max-build-height=256
level-seed=
motd=A Minecraft Server
enable-rcon=false


稳定运行一周之后开始经常提示 Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2205ms behind, skipping 44 tick(s)

并且经常有玩家反映（目前只有使用盗版客户端的玩家有反映这个问题  正版客户端的玩家反映一切正常）
[21:14:11] [Server thread/INFO]: baka_9[/xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:3162] logged in with entity id 538 at (17.0, 57.00999999046324, 281.0)
[21:14:11] [Server thread/INFO]: baka_9 joined the game
[21:15:15] [Server thread/INFO]: baka_9[/xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:3172] logged in with entity id 2694 at (27.81758017675506, 60.0, 258.4593920064375)
[21:15:15] [Server thread/INFO]: baka_9 joined the game
(上面的IP是我改过的  不要在意细节)
这种同一玩家一瞬间登陆两次的情况  而且能在游戏里面看到另外一个自己 但是另外一个自己不会动
过一段时间就会显示这个玩家掉线 信息如下
[21:15:21] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2205ms behind, skipping 44 tick(s)
[21:15:23] [Server thread/INFO]: baka_9 lost connection: TextComponent{text='Disconnected', siblings=[], style=Style{hasParent=false, color=null, bold=null, italic=null, underlined=null, obfuscated=null, clickEvent=null, hoverEvent=null, insertion=null}}
[21:15:23] [Server thread/INFO]: baka_9 left the game

replies.author: OAO_miao
replies.txt_content:
出现Can't keep up! 这种提示就说明负载太高了 
感觉1.8官方版服务器端比172的spigot资源消耗高了不少 尤其是内存占用
那个登陆问题应该和新版机制有关
最近我也在用1.8的服务器端 开正版验证最省事
离线模式对玩家的识别不好弄。。。 白名单都放弃了QAQ
现在急着体验1.8就只能这样凑合了 等以后出bukkit也许会好些吧

replies.author: jiongjionger
replies.txt_content: 服务器刚开出现这个很正常。如果后来还是频繁出现，说明服务器负载太高了，性能不够

replies.author: 月下银翼
replies.txt_content: 因为这服不够好..我租的服也是1.8都没这样的

replies.author: DarkCat
replies.txt_content:
月下银翼 发表于 2014-9-20 17:40
因为这服不够好..我租的服也是1.8都没这样的
你试试将地形参数设置成{"coordinateScale"\:684.412,"heightScale"\:684.412,"lowerLimitScale"\:64.0,"upperLimitScale"\:2.0,"depthNoiseScaleX"\:200.0,"depthNoiseScaleZ"\:200.0,"depthNoiseScaleExponent"\:0.5,"mainNoiseScaleX"\:80.0,"mainNoiseScaleY"\:160.0,"mainNoiseScaleZ"\:80.0,"baseSize"\:8.5,"stretchY"\:12.0,"biomeDepthWeight"\:1.0,"biomeDepthOffset"\:0.0,"biomeScaleWeight"\:1.0,"biomeScaleOffset"\:0.0,"seaLevel"\:6,"useCaves"\:true,"useDungeons"\:true,"dungeonChance"\:8,"useStrongholds"\:true,"useVillages"\:true,"useMineShafts"\:true,"useTemples"\:true,"useRavines"\:true,"useWaterLakes"\:true,"waterLakeChance"\:4,"useLavaLakes"\:true,"lavaLakeChance"\:80,"useLavaOceans"\:false,"fixedBiome"\:-1,"biomeSize"\:4,"riverSize"\:4,"dirtSize"\:33,"dirtCount"\:10,"dirtMinHeight"\:0,"dirtMaxHeight"\:256,"gravelSize"\:33,"gravelCount"\:8,"gravelMinHeight"\:0,"gravelMaxHeight"\:256,"graniteSize"\:33,"graniteCount"\:10,"graniteMinHeight"\:0,"graniteMaxHeight"\:80,"dioriteSize"\:33,"dioriteCount"\:10,"dioriteMinHeight"\:0,"dioriteMaxHeight"\:80,"andesiteSize"\:33,"andesiteCount"\:10,"andesiteMinHeight"\:0,"andesiteMaxHeight"\:80,"coalSize"\:17,"coalCount"\:20,"coalMinHeight"\:0,"coalMaxHeight"\:128,"ironSize"\:15,"ironCount"\:30,"ironMinHeight"\:0,"ironMaxHeight"\:64,"goldSize"\:9,"goldCount"\:2,"goldMinHeight"\:0,"goldMaxHeight"\:32,"redstoneSize"\:8,"redstoneCount"\:8,"redstoneMinHeight"\:0,"redstoneMaxHeight"\:16,"diamondSize"\:10,"diamondCount"\:8,"diamondMinHeight"\:0,"diamondMaxHeight"\:16,"lapisSize"\:7,"lapisCount"\:5,"lapisCenterHeight"\:16,"lapisSpread"\:16}
这种地形我I7+8G内存的电脑运行都感觉很吃资源_(:з」∠)_

replies.author: DarkCat
replies.txt_content:
jiongjionger 发表于 2014-9-20 12:18
服务器刚开出现这个很正常。如果后来还是频繁出现，说明服务器负载太高了，性能不够 ...
会不会和那个奇特的地形有关   注意看地形参数  用这个参数设置出来的地形非常的……混乱

replies.author: 月下银翼
replies.txt_content: =。=你给服务器换个普通地图看看会不会有提示呢,我自建服也还是会有这样的提示完全跑不动……
